articles.title: NASA is troubleshooting Artemis I engine issues. CNN reporter explains - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Kristin Fisher reports from Kennedy Space Center in Florida as NASA investigates an issue with an engine bleed just hours before the scheduled launch of Artemis I. The uncrewed rocket is due to launch on a journey around the moon.
